hero.text: DeerSwap is a DEX dedicated to serving MeMe tokens. Featuring a brand new economy model and a unique Launchpad.

items.title: DeerSwap
items.text: Deer has the industry’s first Active DEX offering competitive swap fees, deflationary mechanics, next-generation staking and farming, a simple yet dynamic UI, and offers the highest levels of safety.

items.title: Deer Services
items.subtitle: DeerSwap, Incubator, DeerPad, Partnerships
items.text: Deer gets projects off to the right start and helps them succeed. Funding, expert advice, launch and liquidity products, co-development, co-marketing, and more are available through our Ecosystem.

items.title: Earn with Deer
items.subtitle: Earn with new staking and farming solutions
items.text: DeerStake makes DeFi easier and more rewarding. The smart staking protocol and compounding farms give the industry’s best fixed APYs. For projects listing on Swych, our pools encourage investors to invest more and stay longer.

items.title: DEER Token
items.text: The DEER token is at the heart of the Deer ecosystem, employing smart functions and deflationary dynamics to provide holders with new levels of incentives and protection.

items.title: Learn more
items.text: Learn more about how the revolutionary Deer ecosystem sets a new standard for a decentralized exchange.

offer.caption: Your keys, your coins
offer.header: Own your crypto and maximize your investments with Deer.
